scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix=shared/database && npm install --prefix=shared/types && npm install --prefix=shared/utils && npm install --prefix=services/config-service && npm install --prefix=services/operator-interface-service && npm install --prefix=services/shipping-service && npm install --prefix=services/stock-integration-service
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --prefix=shared/database && npm run build --prefix=shared/types && npm run build --prefix=shared/utils
scripts.build:services: npm run build --prefix=services/config-service && npm run build --prefix=services/operator-interface-service && npm run build --prefix=services/shipping-service && npm run build --prefix=services/stock-integration-service
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:config" "npm run start:stock" "npm run start:shipping" "npm run start:operator"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev:config" "npm run start:dev:stock" "npm run start:dev:shipping" "npm run start:dev:operator"
